1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Smiles comes home to an unwelcome surprise. Cris and Bulldoze are slighted by Rakim Wilde's comments and plan to fire back. Smiles tries his luck with the lottery.

2.title: Mask Off
2.plot: Ava proposes she and Smiles start a live-streaming VR company together. Ava courts Todd as an early investor. Ava and Smiles travel to Rakim Wilde's hideaway. Bulldoze meets Lina and prepares for his show.

3.title: Admit1
3.plot: Ava and Smiles come up with a new name for their company after Todd is looped into the fold. Ricky suggest that Rakim respond to Bulldoze's diss track with a track of his own. Bulldoze gets a new job offer.

4.title: Soundcheck
4.plot: Rakim Wilde has a breakthrough with the song. Ava runs into a conflict at VRC. Lina gets out of rehab in time to present Bulldoze with a new opportunity. Cris and Bulldoze have differing views about how to deal with Rakim.

5.title: The Pitch
5.plot: Smiles delivers the pitch to investors as Ava live-streams the Rakim Wilde concert. Cris has a plan to put Rakim in his place. Smiles finally sees Cynthia.

imdb.plot outline: Hype is a web series drama about a young man, Smiles, who, through trying to buy back of house of his adolescent love, gets caught up in the startup and rap worlds of Durham, NC. When Smiles is approached by a young woman (Ava) who tells him he is the perfect co-founder for her new company, he hesitantly agrees - not entirely sure of his role. As the company develops, Smiles and Ava become entrenched in a local music scene rife with interpersonal conflict, as well as ambitious, entrepreneurial-minded artists looking for the kind of big break Ava and Smiles might be offering. Ultimately, everyone involved must choose to either take a chance on the unexpected or settle for the status quo.
imdb.title: Hype
plot: _Hype_ (qv) is a web series drama about a young man, Smiles, who, through trying to buy back of house of his adolescent love, gets caught up in the startup and rap worlds of Durham, NC. When Smiles is approached by a young woman (Ava) who tells him he is the perfect co-founder for her new company, he hesitantly agrees - not entirely sure of his role. As the company develops, Smiles and Ava become entrenched in a local music scene rife with interpersonal conflict, as well as ambitious, entrepreneurial-minded artists looking for the kind of big break Ava and Smiles might be offering. Ultimately, everyone involved must choose to either take a chance on the unexpected or settle for the status quo.
